room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape The Room NYC in New York
review: We had a group of 7 that tackled The Dig room. The room was so fun and elaborate - well decorated and detailed. Our clue master was extremely helpful without being overbearing. Would def recommend this to anyone!

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape The Room NYC in New York
review: We participated in the Dig - the plot was interesting and the setup was actually very nice. We didn't make it out but had a ball and we are already planning our next visit. Lastly, the staff was friendly and very accommodating!

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape The Room NYC in New York
review: My friends and I went to The Dig for my birthday. It was a very fun and challenging experience. Definitely something I would do again.

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape The Room NYC in New York
review: My daughter picked this adventure to celebrate her 14th birthday with family and friends... we were doubtful on how fun and entertaining this would be... But everyone not only enjoyed themselves, we couldn't stop talking about it! I recommend you try this at least once, I am sure you'll be back to try another themed room, like we are!

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape The Room NYC in New York
review: Overall fun, but I need to dock rating on 2 big points.We got stuck 20 minutes on a broken electric switch puzzle. We actually solved this correctly but a light was broken and not giving us a light bulb response for completion.The room was also missing an important puzzle piece in the setup! We had 2 copies of one piece of paper rather than an answer key and another paper to decipher it.When the guide came in explain he blew off the broken puzzle and missing paper (although he tested and did confirm that the electric switch puzzle was broken and that we should have found the paper in an empty spot that was opened).
